## TryCpClient.addConductor() method

Create and add a conductor to the client.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addConductor(signalHandler?: AppSignalCb, config?: string): Promise<TryCpConductor>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  signalHandler | AppSignalCb | <i>(Optional)</i> A callback function to handle signals. |
|  config | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TryCpConductor](./tryorama.trycpconductor.md)<!-- -->&gt;

The newly added conductor instance.
